name: Re:Psy Kill
description:
Explore a vast world with interconnecting areas in this Metroidvania game. Unlock multiple abilities like double jump, wall climb, hand cannon, speed boost, EM Blast, and blink to progress further and become strong enough to defeat the MainFrame. Beware the Scraptron Mini Boss! Explore this vast area with in game loading and use your new abilities to find shortcuts!

Controls: (Controller/Keyboard)

A/Space = jump 
B/B = blink
X/F = melee 
Y/E = interact 
L1/Left Shift = Speed Boost
R1/Tab = cycle melee weapons
L2/Q = AoE/EM blast
R2/R = fire Projectile

Credits:

Code - Revelation
Art - Wellzitu
Design - Akusan
Sounds - Jae
Awake! (Megawall-10) from cynicmusic

Bug Fix 01 - Fixed a bug where game cannot be beaten
Bug Fix 02 - Fixed a collision bug that prevents player from progressing
